name: I am the Cube
description:
In this game you will try to connect to a very uncooperative cube.

To progress the most important thing you need to know is to always, ALWAYS answer with the "truth" (the right answer).

You'd better not be expecting a great game, not even a good one, or you will suffer a serious disappointment. But as long as you'd settle with a funny one, you'll be fine.

Of course you could say there's no much of a connection here, and you would be right, the main connection established by this game, has occurred between my little brother (who's written the dialogs), and me.

The background music it's an extract of http://ocremix.org/remix/OCR03037 . Also there's some hidden content that includes https://ocremix.org/remix/OCR02876 and a classic "Hey listen" by a very famous fairy.

The "game" (if you can even call it that) has been built with https://reactjs.org/ and https://get.webgl.org/ borrowing heavily from https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WebGL_API/Tutorial .

The full source of the project can be found at https://bitbucket.org/angarca/connect/src/master/ .
